description: Try our easy to follow Slow Cooker Self-Saucing Chocolate Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow Cooker Self-Saucing Chocolate Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Top 'n' fill caramel spread, salted caramel ice-cream, unsalted roasted peanuts, chopped and shaved

recipeInstructions.text: Divide pudding among bowls. Top with caramel spread, ice-cream, peanuts and chocolate.
